title: Retail sales, Walmart earnings, More Fedspeak: What to know this week - Yahoo Finance
content: Retail sales, Walmart earnings, More Fedspeak: What to know this week  Yahoo Finance
description: The retail sector will be in focus this week after a string of wild trading sessions on Wall Street, with quarterly financials from megastore Walmart and other consumer giants in the queue along with Aprilâ€™s retail sales report. Investors will also tune in for more remarks from Federal Reserve officials.
